content: I'm really interested in the pairing of cooking oils with risotto flavors. For the Mushroom and Truffle Risotto, would truffle oil be too overpowering if I'm already using truffle in the dish? Also, I've been experimenting with cocktail mixing for a month now, and I've found that using premium spirits like Hendrick's gin really elevates the flavors of my drinks. Do you have any recommendations for gin-based cocktails that would pair well with the earthy flavors of mushroom and truffle?
